name: Ozarus
description: Ozarus is an AI-powered on-chain intelligence platform built on Solana, designed to protect traders and communities from scams, rugpulls, and high-risk tokens. The platform scans thousands of tokens daily, providing real-time risk scores, security audits, and token reliability insights. Its mission is to make Solanaâ€™s ecosystem safer, transforming trading from speculation-driven chaos into a transparent, data-backed environment.
